events.description: Man coughs, blood visible on shirt as he leans against car in dimly lit street
Urban traffic and distant voices echo under neon-lit alleyway with three figures
Injured man in suit, blood on chest, gasping, leaning on black car in dark alley
Stallone and woman stand together, she smiles slightly, both look at injured man
Woman speaks, lips moving, slight smile fading as she looks at injured man
Woman speaks, gesturing with hand, eyes focused on injured man’s chest
Injured man looks up, mouth slightly open, sweat on face, eyes wide
Stallone speaks, mouth moving, eyes narrowed, looking at injured man
Stallone speaks, jaw tensed, eyes fixed on injured man
Stallone speaks, head tilted, voice low, eyes tracking injured man
Woman looks at injured man, eyes wide, hair falling over shoulder
Injured man looks down, then up, face strained, breathing heavy
Sustained electronic tone from flashing police lights on car roof
Woman speaks, lips moving, head tilted, eyes on injured man
Woman speaks, mouth open, slight smirk, hand raised
Stallone looks concerned, mouth slightly open, eyes fixed on injured man

segments.text: He doesn't look like one of your usual little life buddies.
He made a mistake of saving his life.
What kind of doctor are you?
He did a year in medical.

[Chunk 2: 20.0s - 26.8s]
